pkgmetadata.longdescription: Perform Phonological Analyses using Maximum Entropy Optimality Theory // Fit Maximum Entropy Optimality Theory models to data sets, generate the predictions made by such models for novel data, and compare the fit of different models using a variety of metrics. The package is described in Mayer, C., Tan, A., Zuraw, K. (in press) https://sites.socsci.uci.edu/~cjmayer/pape rs/cmayer_et_al_maxent_ot_accepted.pdf.
